reviews.review:
Great game I would say, there are many bugs and hackers. That will need to be adressed, but the game is always developed. I would recomend this game for people that are playing in a group for fun :) 

To Those that download the game: Have as much fun and screw around its the best way to enjoy the game before it getts boring !!!!

cs 1.6 used to be my fev game before i played cs:go. i like cs a lot.
nice game, but sometimes cheaters makes game bad.
Counter Strike: Global Offensive does not require an explanation to play. It is one of the best free-to-play games out there with a massive playerbase. I'd recommend giving it a try!
I sunk so many hours into this game and I regret wasting my time
it's alright, don't know why they need so many guns tho.
comp is decent but u will find a hacker every 3-2 matches
Эта самоя лучшая игра, для аутистов

Люблю запускать сиэс гоу, ой, точнее hvh(HAcker versus hacker). Это ведь такая весёлая игра. Особенно, когда встречаешь читера с аимом или крутилкой(Так вроде называется. Я хз, я не читерю, чтобы знать что это за пиздец). В общем, 10 орущих школьников и читеров из 10.

Era un juego que me encantaba y con el que he pasado bastantes horas jugando. Pero desde que es "free to play", se ha infestado de Chetos, y se ha vuelto odioso jugar a este juego. Cuando me entran ganas de jugarlo, se me van las ganas sabiendo que, al metere en partidas competitivas voy a encontrar, a favor o en contra, chetos. 

Gracias por destrozar el counter, tendre que buscarme otro juego
do so the game kost money
